import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Table from './table' import Socket from '../socket' import axios from 'axios' export default function Asistencia() { const [checadas,setChecadas] = useState([]) useEffect(async ()=>{ const res = await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/checada') console.log(res.data) }) Socket.on('checada',(data)=>{ setChecadas(data) }) return (

Asistencias

{console.log(checadas)} ) }
